title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.10 - Airplanes; jets; helicopters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.10 - Airplanes; jets; helicopters

State Regulations

No airplanes, jets or helicopters may land or take off from
any part of the authority facilities without the prior written consent of the
executive director of the authority. Any unauthorized airplane, jet or
helicopter may be removed from the authority facilities by the authority at the
expense of the operator and/or owner of such unauthorized airplane, jet or
helicopter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

204.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
